quote: Those who can make you believe absurdities can make you commit atrocities.  – Voltaire
fact: A literal translation of a standard traffic sign in China: "Give large space to the festive dog that makes sport in the roadway."
joke: Do you want a brief explanation of what an acorn is? In a nutshell, it's an oak tree.
